connectionExists.permissionToUpdate: permission to update your ORCID record
connectionExists.youDoNot: You do not need to do anything more at this time.
connectionExists.differentUser: This authorization link has already been used. Please contact {{ clientName }} for a new authorization link.

error.somethingWentWrong: Oops, something went wrong and we were not able to fetch your ORCID iD

denied.willNotBeAble: will not be able to update your ORCID record.

success.youHaveSuccessfully: You have successfully granted {{ clientName }} permission to update your ORCID record, and your record has been updated with the affiliation information.
success.ifYouFind: If you find that data added to your ORCID record is incorrect, please contact {{ clientName }}
